targets.rawSql: SELECT tracks.name as "Name", tracks.layout as "Layout", tracks.length as "Length" FROM races LEFT JOIN tracks ON (tracks.ordinal = races.track) WHERE id = '$race'
SELECT best_lap * 1000 as "Best Lap", distance_traveled as "Distance Travelled", current_race_time * 1000 as "Race Time" FROM points WHERE race = '$race' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT race_position FROM points WHERE race = '$race' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT cars.make as "Make", cars.model as "Model", cars.year as "Year", car_performance_index as "PI", car_class as "Class" FROM races LEFT JOIN cars ON (cars.ordinal = races.car) WHERE id = '$race'
SELECT lap_number + 1 as "Lap", MAX(current_lap) * 1000 as "Time" FROM points WHERE race = '$race' GROUP BY lap_number ORDER BY lap_number
SELECT created_at, race_position AS "Position" FROM points WHERE race = '$race'
SELECT speed * 3.6 as "Speed", created_at FROM points WHERE race = '$race'
SELECT created_at, gear AS "Gear", engine_current_rpm AS "RPM" FROM points WHERE race = '$race'
SELECT created_at, accel / 250 as "Acceleration", brake / 250 as "Braking" FROM points WHERE race = '$race'

SELECT created_at, tire_wear_front_left AS "Front Left", tire_wear_front_right AS "Front Right", tire_wear_rear_left AS "Rear Left", tire_wear_rear_right AS "Rear Right" FROM points WHERE race = '$race'

SELECT created_at, (tire_temp_front_left - 32) * 5 / 9 AS "Front Left", (tire_temp_front_right  - 32) * 5 / 9 AS "Front Right", (tire_temp_rear_left  - 32) * 5 / 9 AS "Rear Left", (tire_temp_rear_right  - 32) * 5 / 9 AS "Rear RIght" FROM points WHERE race = '$race'
SELECT created_at, fuel AS "Fuel" FROM points WHERE race = '$race'

list.definition: SELECT id FROM races ORDER BY started_at DESC;
list.name: race
list.query: SELECT id FROM races ORDER BY started_at DESC;
